name: Real Archery Master: Epic battle of revenge
name_original: Real Archery Master: Epic battle of revenge
description:
You are a King of your kingdom and your land is under attach! Prepare & master yourself in the art of archery and safe your people from the enemy archery forces. In Real Archery Masters: Epic Battle of Revenge you are an arrow shooter commander of your country forces, your mission is try to hit and kill the enemy targets with you bow and arrows and advance to the next level bases. You can also practice your aiming and targeting skills to advance to new challenging missions and stages. Shooting arrow with bow is a challenging archery skill, practicing your archery skills in Real Archery Masters: Epic Battle of Revenge make your strategy to destroy your enemy archery force. Shoot arrows at the enemy target but don't touch the other arrows. Use the right strategy to improve your accuracy and hit the bulls’ eye on the circle as it twists every time. The more arrows you shoot, the harder it is to be accurate and hit the bulls’ eye. Test your skills and play in one of the most competitive archery games ever. Master all locations and discover their secrets. Be the best archer and rule the rankings. Find and kill your rival enemy archers before they do and protect your kingdom which is under attach in Real Archery Masters: Epic Battle of Revenge!

Game Features:
1) Amazing Old kingdom environment and graphics
2) Easy and Smooth Archery Shooting Game Play
3) Exciting Practice and Challenging Battle field missions
4) User friendly UI and Brilliant game AI
5) Non Stop Action and Thrill
